name: Capability Brown's Pleasure Gardens walk, Petworth

ai.summary: An easy 3.8 km loop through Capability Brown's Pleasure Gardens around Petworth House. This relaxed route combines manicured lawns, tree-lined avenues, and reflective water features for a peaceful stroll suitable for all ages and fitness levels.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat to gently rolling paths with a mix of paved and well-maintained gravel surfaces. Some areas may be grassy or uneven; wear suitable footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Check opening times and access ahead of visit. Paths can be slippery when wet; stay on marked routes and heed garden guidelines. Be mindful of water features and wildlife, and keep children close. Dogs may be required to be on a leash where allowed. Bring water and sun protection; adjust plans for strong winds or icy conditions.
recommended_gear: Map or offline guide of the gardens
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March to October) is ideal for comfortable weather and garden color; winter visits may be possible but could have limited access or shorter opening times.
